pages.text:
Your Event Done Your Way.
Whatever occasion brings you together, we’ll be there to make the moments magical, anticipate every need and make planning a breeze.
Meetings
From well-appointed board rooms to convenient flex spaces, you can count on us to host your next successful meeting.
PLAN
Groups
Whether you’re heading to the game or the family reunion, we’ll make your group feel right at home.
STAY
Sports
From your pre-game huddle to your post-game celebration, we’ll make sure your team has an all-star experience.
PLAY
Hybrid Meetings
Reach and engage a broader audience by adding an online layer to your next live, in-person event at Sonesta.
PLAN YOUR EVENT
Weddings
You deserve the perfect day, and our spaces provide the ideal canvas to make your dreams come true.
CELEBRATE
Special Occasions
No matter the size of the celebration, it’s meant to be shared. Let us take care of the details so you can raise a toast.
GATHER
Sonesta offers venue verified locations for your healthcare gathering.
For gatherings of fewer than 20 people, skip the RFP and reserve your meeting instantly with our easy, one-click booking tool. Select your venue and space setup, choose from all-inclusive small meetings packages and food & beverage options, and you’re all set.
Learn More
Learn more about the Sonesta Work Suite, an Experiential Meeting Space Concept.
A culturally-driven environment, a multi-zone and tech-enabled meeting experience.
Learn More
NEW
Plan Now, Perks Later
Calling all planners! Earn rewards with Sonesta’s new Travel Pass Planner Perks.
The more you book, the bigger the savings on your next event!
Learn More
Join Sonesta Travel Pass rewards program for free nights, our best rates, and more.
ENROLL NOW
Sonesta

Newton, MA 02458

About Us
slice-start id="page-intro-1"
slice-end id="page-intro-1"
Our Brands
Accommodations as Distinct as You
Sonesta’s growing brand portfolio of hotel brands are each as individual as your reason to travel. Whether it’s me-time, we-time, business-time, or family time, Sonesta has a room or suite just for you.
The Royal Sonesta
The Royal Sonesta properties are a collective of unique, memorable hotels in some of the world’s most desirable destinations. Our inspired mix of striking design, unrivaled—but decidedly unstuffy—service, and authentic local touches deliver a stay that truly can’t be replicated. It’s elevated travel for the next era.
Explore Brand
Franchising
As one of the largest hotel companies in the world, we feature 1,100+ locations across eight countries and three continents. Whether you’re looking to open a single property or manage a full portfolio, we work with you every step of the way and help transform your vision into reality.
Explore Franchising Opportunities
Careers
When you join Team Sonesta, you become a vital member of our family—and part of the 8th largest hotel company in the world. 15 Brands. 1,100+ Properties. A lifetime of possibilities.
Start your Career with Sonesta
Our Mission
The mission at Sonesta is to wow every guest, team member, partner and community in which we operate by delivering quality, value, and amazing hospitality.
See How
